content.detailedDescription:
I live in a town home in murfreesboro, tn. we know most of our neighbors in fact two of our good friends live right next door. it was the night of the 4th we were all hanging out outside in front of our town home watching fireworks being shot into the sky by our neighboring apartment complex which is a huge college apartment complex. so needless to say there were plenty of fireworks for us to watch while we chatted amongst ourselves.

there were 4 of us that happened to be hanging out at the time of the event, i happened to be facing north west when i spotted a round pulsating orange light moving slowly (much slower than a prop plane) and moving off to the north east from my position. this orange globe looked to be rather large based on its altitude. i would estimate it to be about as big as a compact car. looked to be about 400 to 700 feet off the ground and traveled silently flickering almost like a campfire. this means that the intensity of the orange light being emitted by this object changed constantly giving it a "globe containing a fire" type of effect.

my neighbors walked down the street to help keep it in view so that the apartments next to our location did not prevent us watching it. but then it just turned off its light, and just as quick as it had begun it ended.

i have never contributed to the mufon database although i have had many encounters watching the skies over the years. i was casually looking at the mufon ufo activity map and noticed after reading the other 10+ accounts that many people witnessed the exact same thing all over the country that same night of july the 4th 2010. so i thought it is almost my duty to confirm this by adding our report.
content.summary: There were 4 of us that happened to be hanging out at the time of the event, i happened to be facing north west when i spotted a round pulsating orange light moving slowly (much slower than a prop plane).

content.detailedDescription: White flash just like a camera, first flash and second flash was a minute differant then the third flash came aboutn 40 seconds later. north to south. and then we didnt see anything after that. we were in the driveway facing east looking for shooting stars. we noticed the object looking around and seeing a flash. we have no idea what it was when we first noticed it. our reaction was: wondering what it was. the object stopped flashing.
content.summary: White flash, minute later white flash further south, once again white flash south.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there, glad that i can share my story with some researchers like you guys.  so this takes place around 1993,  i have had this incident tattooed on my brain ever since, it still amazes me.  so i was about 13 when this happend, it was a dark clear night, coming back from the store with my mom in her mini van.  
   we turned down a long road near the house on our way home, basically i instantlly noticed these 2 what appeared to be "stars" in the sky directly ahead in the distance, but they were way brighter than the other stars around them, and one was right above the other.(if you stick your arm out and hold a bic lighter in your hand thats about how far apart the objects appeared to be) they caught both of our attentions.  
   it really stood out seeing these really bright stars and the other stars were not gleaming like these balls of light were. so we are driving and are about 30 seconds or so down this road, the lights still just look like unusually bright stars, right about then the light on top just shot away to the right and into infinity like it was shot out of a sling shot, just from sitting still to blinding speed and gone in less than a second. then the bottom light shoots off just as fast in the same direction as the other one.  it was crazy! my mom said "did you see that"??  she was shocked and puzzeled. we got home about 5 minutes later and i was out on the deck right away looking for more lights,excited from what we just witnessed but saw nothing else that evening.  havent had a sighting since then but hope i am lucky enough to have another.  please contact me with any questions. - *(wit's first initial deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: 2 bright lights in the sky looked like stars. were stationary for at least 30 seconds and then shot off in a instant, like a bullet. one, then the other. fast as bullet- just gone.

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:45pm on july 27, 2010 i was sitting on my deck listening to the radio and watching the sky.  out of the south i noticed a bright red flashing light and behind it was a very bright group of white lights (assumed to be a jet).  they traversed the sky from south to north at about 35 degrees above the horizon.  i would estimate that they covered about 20 miles in the minute or so of observation.  the distance between the two objects remained the same as it travelled.  as it passed directly in front of my vantage point i could hear a faint jet sound approximately 1000 feet behind the bright white light. while i did not see any material body between the two lights, i got the feeling that it was just one single object.  i'm assuming that this was some type of military craft.
content.summary: A bright red flashing light led what appeared to be a jet across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In our backyard, my fiance noticed some seagulls in the sky and noticed another object of higher altitude. upon observing for approximately 30 seconds he determined the object appeared to be stationary. he said there is something in the sky and pointed to the direction sse. i couldnt see anything so he went to get the binoculars.

my fiance saw a star-like object in the sky. upon viewing the object with 10x binoculars revealed a second glowing red object. both objects changed distance from one another. at first, the red object was apart from the star-like object and then upon a second look several minutes later the red object appeared to be close to the star-like object.

i looked through the 10x binoculars to see five shining orbs. one blue, one pink/red and three white. three of the objects appeared to be moving together to form a line vertically while the other two remained stationary. then the objects seemed to fade away.
content.summary: Shiny star like object and a red glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving i30 west when i noticed a very bright star(i thought) in the western sky not far above the horizon.  i watched it the entire time going west - it wasn't moving, and it appeared that no lights were blinking.  as i continued west, it became slightly brighter.  i went home to benbrook, picked up my nephew & his 10x50 binoculars and went back to get a better look.  we went the direction of weatherford (west of fort worth, pulled over to an area and it had moved even lower on the horizon.  it appeared as multiple orange lights moving directly west. whatever this was, had to be moving very slow for it to still be on the horizon. also - we noticed more aircraft activity to the west - but did not notice any military aircraft and at one point my 18 year old nephew saw a quick light blue flash go from east to west over our heads (this could have been a shooting star - but we are unsure).

the orange lights eventually moved further west towards the horizon until it was out of site at 10:44pm (cdt).

we immediately wanted to report this - and the only spot i knew to do this would be mufon.  we searched the news but did not see anything.  as bright as this was - there will definitely be more people discussing this.

please let us know what you find out.  i do not have a photo, as my kid had busted her camera.  great timing.
content.summary: Shining bright light(s) in the western sky (not the planets)

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of my office for a breath of fresh early morning air before giving my nightshift report and going home i observed a stainless steel looking perfectly round sphere stationary in the sky about 2-3 miles south east from my position and about 3000 feet in the sky which would place it's position over the east end of sky harbour airport. the time was about 5:30 or 5:45 am and the sun had not fully risen but the sky was full of light but the globe itself was reflecting bright sunlight. the sphere/globe reflected a gray/silver color just like stainless steel and there were no other features about it. it was just a perfectly round globe devoid of any markings or external material. if one holds a large childs marble at arms length you get the idea of what size i was seeing. this object was perfectly stationary in the sky and clearly visible to anyone who would look up and as i said looked for all the world to be made of stainless steel. i watched it for a short while and first thought it was a tv satalite. i went back into my office, gave report for my shift and went home not thinking anymore about it. a few weeks later coming out of my office for a breath of fresh morning air at the same time as before i saw it again in the same position perfectly stationary in the sky with the early morning sun reflecting off its exterior. i watched it again for a little while wondering just what it was then gave my night shift report and went home. before i drove off the parking lot i took another look but could not see it again. on the way home i began to realize that it could not be a tv satalite because it had no array of antenas or solar panals etc. and it was positioned in the atmosphere only a few thousand feet up. i am a retired rn and have never seen any other odd objects in the sky.
content.summary: Stainless steel ball fixed position in morning sky about 3000 ft. elevation.

content.detailedDescription:
Dates and times are approximate

one saturday night, after my brother had bought his first laser-pointer, we were on the 5th floor balcony of my apartment building trying to see how far away we could see the beam.  the last of the sunset was fading from the sky when my brother decided to go inside.  i waited outside to see if i could see the beam on a cloud.  the first cloud i saw appeared to be over the downtown area and seemed to be illuminated by the lights of the city.  i tried the laser on it, but couldn't see anything.  so, i looked up, closer to my location.  i could see stars, but no other clouds.  i leaned out from my balcony to look up and see if there were any clouds straight up.  no luck.  that was when i noticed that there was a wedge-shaped section of the night sky obscured above the building.  from the part i could see, it appeared that whatever was up there was mostly blocked from my view by the balconies above. i tried aiming the laser-pointer at the object with no effect.  i went to get my brother to show him what i saw, but it was gone when i got back.

area contains a military barracks(3 blocks away), railroad tracks (less than 100 meters away), and an airport (2 to 3 kilometers away)
content.summary: Witnessed a wedge-shaped object pass directly over my apartment building

content.detailedDescription: It was sunday on a warm july night. about 10:00 pm i was sitting in my family room watching tv with my wife. when i looked out  the window and i noticed a very very brilliant bright gold light in the north east sky. at first i thought it was a star. i believed it was too bright to be a star, especially on a night with a full moon. i thought perhaps it was a low flying airplane. starring out the window for a while, it was not moving like a plane. my wife asked, what are you looking at? i said there  is something out there. i called my wife to take a look. she went and got out our telescope 25 x 100 skymaster.. the gold light was positioned at 2:00 in the sky. when i looked through the telescope i was astonished see what looked like a dark crescent shape craft with different colored  red and blue lights that outlined its shape and bright gold light off center. i asked my wife to take a look and she verified the same craft. it was moving, almost floating very slowly from the north east to the south west. we both felt unsettled and anxious, like it was observing. this sighting lasted for an hour and half before we went inside leaving the craft in the sky starring down. the longer we observed the more creeped out we got and felt compelled to go inside. it was the first time we both have ever seen anything like that before. the next night monday on the 28th i went out with my wife at about 9:30pm and it was there again. i thought perhaps we misidentified it the night before. with the naked eye it looks like a star but when we used the telescope it was a craft of some kind. on the next night, tuesday the 29th, it was very clear night and the craft was not there. afterwards we tried to think about else could it have been, not a star, not a plane, or comet , meteor, satellite, astroid. i can not figure it out. i went on the mufon site and saw a very similar photo of a crescent shaped ufo taken in 1987 in illinois.
content.summary: I was sitting in my family room when i noticed what  a bright light in the north east sky.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my neighbor were sitting outside by the pond, we had a fire going in our fire pit. it was about 1:am, we were looking at the stars, it was a calm clear night. there was no storms forecast in the area. all of a sudden we saw a large cloud like thing that was coming toward us from the north, it was perfectly straight across the bottom, as large a football field, it looked like rolling waves, we both jumped up and said a storms coming, we got to put this fire out. as soon as we stood up it had already gone over us and was gone, we looked to the south looking for it, but didn't see anything. we both just stood there for a few minutes looking at each other. we said "wow that was weird" so we just sat back down then our fire starting flattening down and going circles. we didn't feel any wind or hear anything. whatever it was it was really fast. i've never seen anything like it. ever since i have been watching tv for anything about ufos. it left a big impression on me and my neighbor, we still talk about from time to time. whatever it was it did not look normal.
content.summary: Large rolling cloud that looked like tidal wave, perfectly rectangular shape.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about eight thirty in the evening, my fiancee and i had decided to get on top of our roof to view the lightning from an oncoming storm from the east. we had been up there for a good thirty minutes before anything was actually noticed. 
we were discussing an aspect of our wedding, she was sitting the same direction as i towards the east, but looking at me to the south. i noticed that she was kind of staring off past me into the distance. it was another minute before she says anything. "do you see that?" she asked me. i look to where her eyes are gazing. my first thought was that it was a street light, the orange yellow light it emitted "i have no clue, what is that thing?" i ask out loud. we watch in silence for another moment. it is hard to describe the movement of the object. a kind of slow smooth gliding or hovering. i remember clearly that the movement was very smooth, unlike an aircraft. my heartbeat quickens and i am suddenly very anxious. i say,"maybe a helicopter?" "no, the light is different and there is no sound." she tells me. whether it was from the cool wind or from the realization that i had no explanation for this, the hairs all over my body were standing on end. it made its way from the airspace above downtown closer then subtly shifted directions towards the east and soon the light faded in the distance. i suddenly noticed something else, "that's odd" i say,"it was going against the wind straight into that storm."
we had been so submerged in watching the object we realized only then that we hadn't even thought of getting a camera or phone to call my mom, whom could have seen it very clearly from where she lives on the outskirts of town. i contacted her and one of my friends to tell them what we had just seen, still very excited at this encounter. it was through my friend i came here to share this story that still amazes me.
content.summary: Round, hovering, flickering such as a flame but emitting no light around it just directly from the center source.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my freind were boating near peabody beach in middletown when my freind noticed something unusual in the sky towards the stern of the boat at first i thought it was a star but then i noticed that it was moving this didnt alarm me because there were c-130 transport planes flying nearby but i realized later that it was far too fast to be a c-130 and the way it suddenly changed directions like no other aircraft ive seen before told me it was something different than a plane or helicopter after about three minutes it went above clouds and dissapeared
content.summary: Silverish moving light.

content.detailedDescription:
7 miles as the crow flies across a valley from mr ranier there is a place called sun top.  it is probably 4-6 thousand feet in altitude.  3/4 of the way up sun top there is a campsite that is on a ledge and looks out over the huckleberry creek river valley which flows south from ranier.  you get a fantastic view of the valley, the mountain and the night sky.

1 oclock pacific time (approximately) my wife becky and i had our backs to the valley and the mountain when suddenly there was a bright flash out in the valley ..Maybe a quartermile or so away from us.  this light was so bright that even being that far away it created shadows of us on the foothill next to suntop.  when the flash happened both our backs were to the flash and i turned left to see what it was and saw nothing but becky turned right and saw a bright blue light burst out of the bright white light and zoom ...Really zoomed toward mount ranier.  after that we were definately watching the sky as there was little or no moon and everything is big and bright up there.  now on suntop there is a 4 thousand foot hill across a little hollow across from suntop this is too the north of suntop i was looking east and coming around suntop was these weird lights.  they were like a grid on 4 squares of lights right under these was another row of lights.  rectangle lights four retangled white bright light ..Brighter more white light two on top and two rectangle lights right under the other white lights  the middle two lights were red and the end two were green.  mind you the bright white light there was four the others there was only two.  i remember saying as it was ..Drifting/floating directly above us that i could not hear anything i cant hear anything.  the lights in the front were so bright even though it was only maybe a hundred yards right above us i coulnd not see how big or the shape.. just two bright.  at that point it was right above our heads and still we heard nothing.  suddenly a light came on and pointed straight up into the sky and as we were watching it the light suddenly turned down towards us and bathed us in the beam.  it did not point down and find us it came right on us ..Not to the right or the left of us but right straight on us.  lol, at this point we had no idea what to do so silly us just waved at it.  i am not sure how long we were in the light it only seems a few seconds but then it started to drift away out toward the huckleberry creek river valley (where the flash at the beginning of all this happened and started this whole thing.  still hearing nothing watching the ...Ship??? float/drift back to the spot of original entry it turned toward the mountain and we could see red lights shaping a red trialgle on the top of it.  this point it looked like an arrow head and we thought it was coming back for us.  it then flashed blue and for lack of a better term warped towards mount ranier and was gone.  faster than anything i mean it was gone.  10-15 seconds after the ufo flash out towards mount ranier we final heard a noise like a sonic boom but not quite as loud and earthshaking.

the only thing else was we did check and there was no scheduled flights over suntop but no the less it was definately nothing i have ever seen before of since but it has definately change my outlook on things. 

sorry the only proof i have of this is my wife was with me and after 7 or so years she will still tell you the exact same thing.

thanks that is my story

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Bright light in valley over ranier bright enough to make shadow. blue light flashes out toward mt  then reappears 3 hrs later floating over our heads.

content.detailedDescription:
on july 27, 2010 at approximately 19:30 my roommates and i were sitting on our front porch.  john, my mother���s boyfriend, noticed something gliding through the sky.  the object was noticed in the eastern sky flying in a ssw direction.  we had visual observation of the craft for about 5 minutes before it faded out of sight.  

     the craft was a silver cigar shape with a dark band in the middle.  i could not make out any wings or a tail.  it was completely silent, and there was no contrail.  i live in the hills.  most planes go out of sight over a hill, but unlike most airplanes i see, this did not go over the horizon out of sight.  rather, the object seemed to get smaller and smaller, until it was no longer visible. 
    
    there was a sense of confusion upon realizing all the strange attributes of this craft.  i managed to remember to grab my camera and i was able to capture several photos on a nikon d-3000 dslr camera.
content.summary: Cigar shaped, apparently no wings or tail, no sound or contrail.

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry but i want to explain in spanish(im from argentina). 

estaba dormida ,eran las 5 am,cuando de repente siento que al lado de mi cama hay dos personas,muy bajas ,sin pelo,y muy desgadas,en la oscuridad llegue a verlos con dificultad,uno de ellos puso un dedo en mi frente y salio de uno de los dedos ,una aguja muy fina ,la cual penetro mi craneo,en la parte de la frente,me dolio,y no podia llegar a abrir bien los ojos,pero llegaba a verlos,ya q mi habitacion no era tan oscura y se filtraba luz desde afuera,fue rapido,cuando me sacaron la aguja ,ellos se desintregraron en pequenas particulas en la oscuridad,fue rarisimo. 
espero puedan traducir esta nota con respecto a mi experiencia,creo q existen y no tengo miedo.
---------------------------
translation.7/23/2010: writer was assigned this case because the reporter is from argentina and felt better to explain herself in the spanish language. the report indicates that this event occurred in the state of texas, city of houston in harris county, in april,2006. the reports states that as,the reporter,she was lying in bed sleeping at about five am (5 am)she noticed that two(2) entities-beings, very slim and short in stature, were by her side. one placed a finger on her forehead. a very thin needle protruded from the finger on the forehead penetrating her scull and produced immense pain. she was still able to see them due to some light from another room. shortly thereafter the needle was retracted and the finger was removed from her forehead. immediately thereafter the two (2) beings desintegrated into small particles. she believes that they exist and she is not afraid. 

writer will be interviewing reporter via telephone in near future. 

investigation continues.... 

hector j. trujillo, fi, fl
content.summary: See detailed dscription

content.detailedDescription:
I got off work at the main post office around 5:00 in the morning when two air craft in formation appear to be flying low in the sky. they made a wide turn using the capital building as a reference, coming from the south west and going back to the south west. the crafts appear to be ���v��� shaped. i could not hear any noise. one other person who worked at the post office saw the same thing at her home that same time that night.

not to far from harrisburg is the letter kenney army base. this base is supposed to refurbish military equipment. however, in the back of the base are underground bunkers with two large hanger doors. they also have a large landing pad in front of the doors. no helicopters are present at the area. the place is restricted and not even the state police know what is going on in this underground bunker.   

this base is south west of harrisburg and this is the direction where the strange crafts were coming from and the direction where they went.  also in the harrisburg area at the same time, rope style vapor trails have been seen in the sky in early morning. no conventional air craft make such trails.
content.summary: Two rectagular shaped ships in formation.

content.detailedDescription: i am 47 yrs old now but was about 16 when this took place.I was walking  goat island resort back to our lake house[south to north] and noticed a bright glowing orange ball moving up over the tree line across the lake nne in the wildlife refuge area.It hovered 200-300 ft about 2 min. then went down slowly behind the tree line.The distance was less than a half a mile[aprox 2000 ft]from where i was standing.At that time[1979]that area was closed to the public but is now open for hiking.This was really weired but at that age i just did not care that much about it but now i am amazed how many people are reporting the same type of things over years.I have told only a few people about this event but i was with a friend when this happen,but it is kinda cool to at least vent this to someone who cares.Thanks for listening!
content.summary: Orange orb, [just one] seen rising up rapidly over tree line [north], hovered 300 ft aprox 2 min across lake in wildlife refuge area!

content.detailedDescription: As the sun was down but still light to the west, i saw a bright star like object looking west from north side of ottertail lake mn above the treeline but it was many times larger than any star. caught my eye through back porch doors and just hung above the trees. thought object could have been more than 10 miles in the distance. was stationary. i ran outside to get a better look and it went from a bright multi colored star like object with spikes out in the distance then turned into a small pin like blue light with blue halo around it. flickered twice and then slowly went dim. sighting was approx. 30 seconds. i heard a jet in the area. turned around to go back in the house and a low flying jet almost went right over my house approx 2-3k ft.?? jet looked like had three white lights on it (one in front and one one each wing). i could not see nav lights on it. jet was heading east and then banked north slowly and then gone. jet was moving slow and was not very loud. i did not have my digital video camera with but went inside to load my cannon with film and put on my 300mm zoom. my camera will be ready if i see it again. i bet there are others who saw this happen and hope to hear more about it.
content.summary: Large star like with spikes and then turned blue dot with halo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving for work in the morning about 4:45 a.M. and was looking up at the stars before i got in my vehicle (it was very clear sky's). that's when i noticed a red light moving in the sky at very high altitude. at first i thought it was a satellite that's when i noticed two other red lights and it was a black (or some other dark color) triangle.

i know that sounds weired but it was a black triangle and had red lights at each corner. the reason i know it was a triangle instead of three individual lights was as it moved across the sky the object blocked the lights of the stars behind it. focusing on the object harder you could see the body of the object as well. the object was at high altitude and was heading due east at  very high speed. from the time i first saw the object until i couldn't see it anymore was about 15 to 20 seconds. no plane is going to shoot across the sky at that altitude in 15 seconds.

this has been definitely one of the coolest things i have ever seen. i don't know if it was military in nature or something else, but i would love to find out.
content.summary: Black triangle had red light at each corner.

content.detailedDescription: On the way home from the lake i live on, about 20ft from shore i heard this whiney engine noise.  i turned around after seeing the look of shock on my friends face and saw a low flying aircraft that was oval shaped.  i was in to much shock myself to think of what it was at the time my brain couldnt process it. it wasn���t flying very fast maybe about 15mph.  it was flying right above the tree line.  it was silverfish with 4 lights, 3 white ones and 1 flashing red one.  it was unlike anything i���ve ever seen or heard and i can���t think of what else it could be.  me and my friend were in disbelief and shock at first but then reality hit us and it felt lik ewe were both going to cry for some reason.
content.summary: Saw a ufo above the tree line on my way home on a boat.

content.detailedDescription:
Like the witness in ontario canada who took some pictures of a yellow/golden star... i also saw this star between 1h00am and 4h30am.

i bring with me my father outside to look at the star, he never saw a star so bright.

when i asked if we have any camera... the color of the star fade out!

when you take a picture of this star, isn't the same color as when you look with your eyes.

so.... this star is there every night... 1am-4am (montreal time)

i contacted some local medias to get an answer and some media coverage.

i invite you, if you see this star to report it on your local media. we need more media coverage about this star.
content.summary: Eastern golden/yellow star.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling in an airliner over the city of philadelphia, pa, i was in a window seat, situated about 4 or 5 rows back from where the right wing protruded.  i was basically just looking down toward the ground.  i can only assume our altitude was around 15000 ft, due to the fact that we had already been descending toward the airport.  it was around 8:00 pm eastern time.  the sun was beginning to set in the west, which was almost directly to my right, perpendicular to our path south toward the airport.
while looking down toward the ground, i noticed what looked to be a silver sphere-shaped object approximately a thousand or so feet below, traveling the opposite direction that our jet was traveling.  it looked about the size of a volkswagen beetle.  there were no wings.  it traveled in a straight course, without deviation.  i watched the object cross my viewing region for only about 5 seconds.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object about the size of a volkswagen

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at around 11 am and decided to take my camera to take pictures of the morning sky. i live on the 20th floor of a building, so i have a very good view if the surrounding area. the sky was completely clear at the time and there were no planes or other identifiable objects in sight. the sky was simply just clear blue. no clouds either.I, unfortunately, took only 2 pictures as i didn't see the point in wasting the memory of my camera on empty blue sky. on that same day, it was at around 5:00 pm that i decided to look through the pictures on my camera for anything strange i might have captured that i didn't see before. i do this regularly because i am already a strong believer in the ufo phenomenon. so, to my surprise, i actually got a picture of something i couldn't explain. the object in the picture seemed to be very far away and yet pretty big. i say this because even though the distance between me and the object was huge, you could still see the object with some length of detail. at the time, my cameras zoom was set to x6.0 . the camera i was using was a full hd 1080p sony(13.6 mega pixels). sure enough the picture was in very good quality. as i said before i did not see a single thing in the sky while i was taking the pictures. this all the information i have. please, if you can, analyze the picture and get back to me with the results.
i will provide the 2 original pictures, the third picture will be an enlarged copy of both of the originals put side by side.
content.summary: I woke up in the morning and started to take pictures of the morning sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a park ranger assigned in law enforcement at glen canyon national recreation area (lake powell). on the night of 6/29/1981 a gentleman called the wahweap district ranger office and requested a ranger meet him at the wahweap launch ramp. a ranger responded and took this formal department of interior, national park service, case incident report.  the incident was given case incident number 811310.

the gentleman reported, that two nights earlier, his group of 15 individuals from salt lake city, utah were camping in cow canyon, in the escalante river arm, of lake powell. the group were all members of the lds church and there was absolutely no use of alcohol, or drugs on the trip.  the group had a houseboat, that was used as a base, for the trip.

note:  the following account is taken directly and verbatim from the national park service case incident report number 811310.  i have used quotation marks for all information taken verbatim from the case incident report.  where i have used the word "name" i have left out the name of the person who gave the account of the incident, to the national park service.  i have corrected some obvious spelling errors that were in the original account and i have put in brackets ( ) information that can clarify the report, to persons reading it. 

"on 06-29-81, at approximately 1715 hrs.(5:15 p.M.), recieved a call from a visitor wanting to report a strange experience in the escalante river.  i contacted name at approx. 1745 hrs.(5:45 p.M.), on the launch ramp (wahweap launch ramp).  on 06-27-81, at approximately 2230 hrs. (10:30 p.M.), name and 14 other persons in his group were camped in cow canyon, a side canyon off the escalante (escalante river arm of lake powell).
"name" was about to tell the group a story of an incident his family experienced five years earlier in explorer canyon, which is  the next canyon south of cow canyon, when the same experience began to happen again.  a bright light, which was described to be flashing at 2-4 second intervals, was coming down the left side of the canyon in midair. it circled above the group and then flew down the right side of the canyon.  the light was described to be similar to a strobe light and bright enough to light up the canyon wall.  the group observed the light flying in close proximity to their campsite for approximately one and a half (1 1/2) hours. at one point it (the object) was thirty (30) feet away when group member shined a spot light on it and described what he saw as "creature-like." further details include: "winged and larger than a bat." name then stated that another light appeared and seemed to flash a signal which was answered by the original light. both lights then disappeared down the middle of the canyon.  name stated that this experience was very similar to the one five (5) years ago in explorer canyon, only the light was brighter.  no alcohol was consumed by any member of the group that night. cleared 1800 hrs. (6:00 p.M.)." 

to me this is an amazing report. the individual making the report did not want his name used and wanted no publicity for himself. the length of time (i.E. 1 1/2 hrs.) that the object was observed, is in itself remarkable and i have not heard of any other report of this duration.

during the summer of 1981 the national park service received a number of reports, from visitors, camped on the shoreline of lake powell, of "giant fireflys." several of the reports were recieved at the carl hayden visitor center,located near glen canyon dam.  at first the national park service, staff members, thought the campers were seeing the strobe lights on the stacks of the navajo generating station, southeast of page, arizona. these lights can be seen for miles but some of the campers were in canyon locations, where the power plant stacks could not be seen. it is possible that the sightings of "giant fireflys" were what the group of 15 saw on the night of 6/27/1981.

there was a second verbal report given to the bullfrog district ranger about a similar sighting to the 6/27/1981 one. the second report was not documented unfortunately but occured two, weeks after the 6/27/1981 report. the individuals who made the second report, were supposed to be on lake powell for a week, on a houseboat. the first night out of bullfrog, utah, where they rented the houseboat, they camped in cow canyon, the same canyon as the 6/27/1981 sighting. the second sighting was very similar to the first sighting. the second group were so disturbed by what they saw, that they returned to bullfrog marina, the following morning and turned in their houseboat and said "we are getting the hell out of here," after describing what had happened to them.

i have a kept a copy of the original case incident report over the years because of the unusual nature of the ufos observed. i did submit a copy of this case incident to the aerial phenomenon research organization in tucson and they thought it was a most interesting sighting.
content.summary: Two animate ufos were seen by a group of 15 individuals, who were camped in cow canyon, on lake powell.

content.detailedDescription: I am a firefighter and i was on duty on wednesday, july 21, 2010 when i saw the object. three of our four crew members (myself and two others) were walking through the desert area just behind our fire station, catching scorpions when one of the guys said,"woah, woah, woah!" i thought he saw a snake or something on the ground, so i looked all over the ground by my feet and he started to tap me and pionted up to the southwest sky. he wasn't able to talk. he just motioned to the sky. i looked up and caught about a half to three quarters of a second of a round, green light with a green halo light surrounding it. it flew horizontally across the sky, from east to west, at the same altitude throughout its duration, at an extremely high rate of speed, making no sound at all and dissappeared when it reached the southwest sky. the other two guys saw at least 2-3 seconds of its flight before it disappeared. it didn't go behind anything. it just disappeared completely. coincindentally, luke air force base is southwest of our fire station. i see jet planes and various aircraft constantly flying over and around our station all the time. they have conventional lights and strobes on them. this green craft was like nothing i have ever seen before fly in the sky around my station. i have seen tons of ufo videos and footage in my life. i am pretty savy when it comes to ufos and their flight patterns. this was similar to lots of ufo pics i have seen before and had similar rates of speed than them too. it is a topic that i am very interested in, but this isn't wishful thinking when i saw this since all three of us saw the same thing. the funny thing is that we, at the fire station frequently talk about ufos and aliens on a regular basis. needless to say, we were excited but not too terribly surprised since we do believe that these things really do exist. all we need now is for our government to acknoledge and admit to the public that they exist since they already know anyway. if they did come out with the truth, most people would be as surprised as they were when liberace and ricky martin came out of the closet(we all saw that coming...Lol). i would like to remain anonomous.
content.summary: Round, green light with green halo/aura completely surrounding it.

content.detailedDescription:
My son came to me early in the morning over a month ago in my house crying and scared. he rarely dreams or tells me about it anyway... this particular morning, he came to me visibly upset telling me he dreamed about aliens. i would never take him serioulsy normally but this morning and the way he acted made me listen. he began to tell me that (in his dream) he woke up and a little gray men took him with them out the door and took him on their ship. the gray men had big black eyes and when i asked about the nose he pushed his up, and into his face, i'm thinking to make it look like there wasn't much of one except for holes, maybe? i asked him about their hands and he said their fingers looked long like sticks. he said the ship was silver with yellow, green and white lights. he said it was a ball with a ring around it...He said they took him to the moon. he told me they were talking in whispers and he remembered them telling him to "stay.... stay with us." he kept repeating that. he said he was scared and told them to take him home to mommy. i know that people can be influenced as well as children by television and whatnot, but i'm nearly 100% positive that he has not seen any show where a detailed account of an abduction has been explained. i have been watching everything i can on abductions since he came to me and it really sounds eerily similar to an alleged account of. he is a truthful child. he had just turned 5 and i can always get the truth from him. he sounded totally legit. i know it could have been a dream but isn't that how some people remember? i've never heard him come and tell me a dream so vividly and detailed. i thought it should be my duty to report this and if anything else happens, i will definitely report again. thanks for even taking the time to read this. 

rma
content.summary: Weird dream that my son had - possible abduction?

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just finished dinner at a friends home, we turned onto i-675 headed south fron the greene shopping center.  i initially noticed a falling object that appeared to be on fire.  i alerted my wife as i thought it was atypical of a shooting star or anything else we have witnessed.  the object appeared to be falling when it split into 3 seperate pieces.  all three pieces maintain the identical distance and desending speeds.  the three parts then broke apart and several of the pieces hovered on the horizon.  all of the objects appeared to be in a formation with identical spacing.  then as they hovered they appeared to dim on and off for several minutes.  i have seen several reentry events and this was by far the most bizarre.  we lost sight of the objects when we exited i-675 on exit 2.  the entire event lasted about 10 minutes.  i have not been able to id this event but i am sure it was not a plane, or flares, or any previously orbiting body.
content.summary: Small fireball with tail (at onset of event).

content.detailedDescription:
I was enjoing the night in my bagjard, looking at the sky. there was many stars and my eyes noticed 5 spesific stars, because it seemed like they flashed alot. sudentlig one apeard from the stars and began moving away. i followed it, and then it turned around and went back. later so did the one that looks like it is a little away from the other 4. this one also came back, but to the position it was in before. then they began flashing like they where communikating to eachother. i got my camera. 

i captured only a few seconds out of 20 minutes. i captured it with my digital photo camera and could not se in the camera, that is why it is so shaky and it was not before i saw it on the computer that i really realized i had it. the whole 20 minutes the other 4 lights didn't move, but it was like they comunicated with the lights.

first movie you can se the light. i went out a few nights later to capture the same place, so people could se, that those stars was not there. stayed out all night to make sure.
content.summary: Sitting in my back yard i noticed some stars i thought, but they behaved strange.

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured yesterday  27 july 2010 1:58:27 pm, camera shutter speed 1/1002 second. it shows one or two orange color light ball pop out from the rectangle  ufo. 
 please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: *(info moved to "additional information" section below--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Orange light ball and rectangle ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
We had a bbq for 4th of july, then went to a friend's house.  when we got back home (after midnight) i was putting some things away (lawn chairs, etc) at about 1 a.M. & just looked up at the night sky to admire the stars, & to the east (at about a 45 degree angle saw an aircraft in the sky).  as i viewed this aircraft i could not determine whether it was a plane, helicopter, or military vessel.  it caught my attention, because it was so low...The airport isn't too far from us, but usually we don't see plane flying that low around here.  so, i watched it for about 2 min.  it seemed to move or maybe hover. it had 2 white lights & one red one in the middle of the 2 white lights.  as i watched, it seemed to be getting closer, but not like a plane. i found this a little strange, but dismissed it at first as maybe military tests (since we have a military base near by)it wouldn't be that unusual.  when i heard about what others saw that night, i am sure i saw it.  i don't own a t.V. & don't watch the news, it's depressing.  i just surf the internet for the info i want to hear about.  so 2 days ago, i put in google (alien sightings in clovis) and mufon/jeffery popped up. 


thats when i decided to contact you.  there was also an incident back in 2004.  at my mom's house, where i am now...My bf & i were sitting on the back of his oldsmobile, looking up at the sky & just conversating. we looked up & there was this steath like triangle shaped aircraft.  it made no noise whatso-ever. was dark, no lights at all, & passing right above us.  slowly, almost like it was hovering.  i didn't report it because i just figured it was military, lemoore airforce base isnt too far from us.
content.summary: Hovering or moving very slowly, in the distance. quiet, large, & bright.
